column5: Thought I would share some pics from the past weekend.  We headed to the cottage as usual. I had a ton of work to do so my only fishing was between 5am - 7am and 8pm - 10pm.  Saturday  That morning I started bass fishing for the first hour or so without a hit. So I decided to hit up some pike spots. The pike were CRAZY     I was getting one every cast for 45 minutes. Most were around the 30" mark. Unfortunately I only had my iphone to take pics.        That night I brought my camera with me and of course only landed snot rockets, a bowfin and some WGSF. I did mess around with my suction cup mount a bit.      Sunday  Sunday was an interesting day. I managed to sneak out at lunch while the kids were busy. I managed to catch a new PB and a funny surprise. Luckily I found some people to snap a pic for me.    That night we had a fire on the beach and enjoyed everyone's fireworks from down the beach              Monday  We decided to take the boat to Turkey Point and anchor so that the kids could swim and play with some different scenery.            I have this one trained pretty well
Awesome weekend Dan! What is that some kind of goldfish?
Those are some awesome pics Dan.  Is that a goldfish?
Great looking weekend Dan.
Great weekend.....love Turkey Point!!!  Some nice bass down by the harbour where the restaurants are at the end of the beach....
great lookin weekend- I need to get down there for some pike soon.
A really nice family weekend for you Dan. Perfect!
A great family weekend!!,tell us about the goldfish!
Nice family time Dan.   Is that a GOLD FISH?
unfortunately, many of these can be seen in the canals at turkey point in the spring when targeting crappie. apparently they're around in the summer too
Great pics, Dan! The fireworks look awesome on the beach, and that goldfish is crazy! :-)
Ya it's a friggin gold fish lol
good salmon bait
Great post Dan!! Looks like one heck of a great long weekend!
Awesome weekend Dan !!! Goldfish.........Aye Carumba
Very nice Daniel!!
Fantastic Report! Looks like a fun family outing for all.
I don't know what my reaction would be like if I pulled a goldfish out of the waters LOL
awesome pictures dan great weekend
Looks like fun Dan....great pics.  Cant believe how clear the water looks....could almost be the caribbean!
